effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to confuse the target. This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop. During rain dance, this move has 100% accuracy. During sunny day, this move has 50% accuracy.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to confuse the target. This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop. During rain dance, this move has 100% accuracy. During sunny day, this move has 50% accuracy.

short_effect.black_white: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target.

flavor_text.black_white: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. It may also confuse the target.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. It may also confuse the target.
